dataStudio.name: Matomo Analytics
dataStudio.description: The officially supported Matomo connector: explore your Matomo reports in Looker Studio at no cost. Connect to Matomo Cloud instances or self-hosted instances using just a Matomo Auth Token. Learn more: https://matomo.org/looker-studio
dataStudio.shortDescription: The officially supported Matomo connector: explore your Matomo reports in Looker Studio at no cost.
